dialogue.speaker: Alice
dialogue.message: I'd try to act normal and not arouse suspicion. Something like, "Let's work together to ensure no one gets eliminated today." or "I think we can trust each other in this game."

dialogue.message: I agree, Alice. Let's maintain a united front and keep an eye on each other to ensure safety in this game.
